sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: This package contains compface, uncompface and libcompface.

sect3.title: compface
sect3.para: compface is a filter for generating highly compressed representations of 48x48x1 face image files.

sect3.title: uncompface
sect3.para: uncompface is an inverse filter which performs an inverse transformation with no loss of data.

sect3.title: libcompface
sect3.para: libcompface allows the compression and decompression algorithms to be used in other programs such as MTAs.
